format: html

```{r}
#| cache: true
#| collapse: true

library(readr)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(splines)
library(ggplot2)
library(dbscan)
data = read_csv("./links.csv")
links = st_as_sf(data,coords=c("long","lat"),crs=4326) |>
  group_by(group,linkid,citycode) |>
  summarise(do_union=FALSE) |>
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
utd=read_csv("utd19_u.csv")

detectors= read_csv("./detectors_public.csv")

selected_city = "zurich"

utd_sel_clean = utd|> filter(city==selected_city,error==0)
detids = utd_sel_clean |> select(detid) |> unique()
detids_sub = detids |> sample_n(15)
```
